alert.note: Alert for Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Southern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 28 at 9:53AM PST until March 01 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 to 32 expected. * WHERE...Southern Sacramento Valley, Carquinez Strait and Delta and Northern San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 8 AM PST Wednesday. For the second Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 8 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Southern Sacramento Valley
